turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hi, how can I help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, I need to order a couple of pizzas from a place called Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I need three medium Gluten-Free crust pizzas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, what toppings would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I need two cheese pizzas and one pepperoni.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, you are ordering 3 medium Gluten Free pizzas, 2 cheese, and 1 pepperoni, is that correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, your total will be $57, is that ok?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That is excellent. Thank you so much.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like to dine-in, pick-up, or have your order delivered?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: It's going to be a pickup, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, your pizzas will be ready in 40 minutes and your receipt will be texted to you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Can I help with anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you, sir. Nope, that's it. Thank you so much.
